definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: Jinchangyu Gold Mine experienced four great structural movements. Each movement appeared in the form of folds and fractures.
sentences.chinese: 金厂峪金矿经历了四期大的构造形变。

sentences.english: Other very important, but more complicated, deformations are bending and torsion.
sentences.chinese: 其他非常重要，但更为复杂的是弯曲形变和扭转形变。

sentences.english: Other very important, but more complicated, deformations are bending and torsion.
sentences.chinese: 其他非常重要，但更为复杂的是弯曲形变和扭转形变。

sentences.english: And so there is deformation,friction effects,tidal effects and so on.
sentences.chinese: 形变，摩擦，潮汐作用等等。

sentences.english: And the displacement of speckle image reflects the distortion or displacement of objects.
sentences.chinese: 而激光散斑图像的位移可以反映出物体的位移或形变。

sentences.english: Relativistic mean field theory in the rotating frame is used to describe superdeformed nuclei.
sentences.chinese: 用转动框架中的相对论平均场理论描述超形变核。

sentences.english: Twin lamellae will be deformed differently when rolling in different direction.
sentences.chinese: 随轧制方向不同，孪晶在形变中的行为也不同。

sentences.english: In this paper, The Microstructure of hard-Aluminum Alloy LY12 in superplastic deformation is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文对超塑性形变过程中的组织变化进行了研究。

sentences.english: Deformation microstructure in a Fe Mn Cr N austenitic steel shows strict crystallographic features.
sentences.chinese: 奥氏体钢在低温下形变组织具有严格的晶体学特征。

sentences.english: The reflection asymmetric shell model approach has been developed for the description of octupole deformed nuclei.
sentences.chinese: 发展反射不对称壳模型，描述八极形变核。

sentences.english: Vibrating optical fiber will bend and be deformed.
sentences.chinese: 光纤振动时必然导致光纤的弯曲和形变。

sentences.english: The compliance effect of a high-speed ball-screw feed-drive system is modeled in this work.
sentences.chinese: 文中建立了高速滚珠丝杠进给系统屈服形变模型。

sentences.english: Moreover, the calculated result of monitoring data is given for horizontal deformation monitoring net in Lintong region.
sentences.chinese: 并给出了对临潼水平形变同监测资料的试算结果。

sentences.english: The director deformation caused by a charged colloidal particle suspended in a nematic liquid crystal is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究悬浮在向列相液晶中带电胶粘引起的指向矢形变。

sentences.english: Theoretically bend and deformation increase transmission losses in the fiber.
sentences.chinese: 从理论上讲，弯曲和形变都会增大光纤的传输损耗。

sentences.english: The impact toughness of strain-strengthening dual-phase steel at low temperature was re searched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了形变强化双相钢的低温冲击韧度。

definition: deformation/to become deformed/to change shape/to morph
